name: Puse
body:
### Welcome to Puse project page

### What is Puse?
 
Puse is an simple [sequence diagram](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sequence_diagram)  drawer which has different approach for generating diagrams.Instead of drawing sequence diagrams in old fashioned way like dragging and dropping items. Puse enables user to give textual commands and generate the correspond graphics immediately.

### Which language and frameworks used to develop Puse ?

Puse is written in Java-Eclipse and it uses [PlantUml](http://plantuml.sourceforge.net/) framework for generating sequence diagrams.

### Video Tutorials 

I decide to do some video tutorials instead of writing a long document about functionality.

1.[Introduction](http://youtu.be/bVb_QMe8Bjw)

2.[Removing Footer From Diagram](http://youtu.be/4B3div_4RnA)

3.[Developing Sequence diagrams incrementally](http://youtu.be/XHCHbEC2D8o)

4.[Open Referenced diagram in new editor](http://youtu.be/u0dnRQigDfs)

5.[Referencing another diagram](http://youtu.be/01th_yb8cTk)

6.[Referencing another diagram on object](http://youtu.be/Yg89jgCTR6s)

7.[Referencing another diagram dynamically](http://youtu.be/D3cNK80knNw)

8.[Exporting diagram](http://youtu.be/_mJ71JmST5g)

If you request any video please send me an e-mail.

###Development
Puse developed in [Eclipse](http://www.eclipse.org/). I put my eclipse-working directory on my github. So if you just open Eclipse or [IntelliJ IDEA](http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/) and [import ](http://agile.csc.ncsu.edu/SEMaterials/tutorials/import_export/) your project you can start work on it. You probably need [update the build-path](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HsPZe-9hyJ4) because Puse uses other frameworks. All frameworks included in directory. [Here](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/doc/html/index.html) is the Java doc page which you can see all methods. 

###Syntax 

I will try to provide an document for syntax. However, you can look [here](http://plantuml.sourceforge.net/sequence.html). 

###Download and Install 

You can download Puse from [here](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/puse-setup.jar).

##Requirements 

1. Java
2. Graphviz 

##Windows 

1. Run setup file

2. Choose** user file** to install Puse, otherwise Puse will not able to generate diagram.(See image below)

![windows installation ](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/images/windows.png)

##Linux

1.) In order to run the setup file you need to give permissions in your Linux system.

![setup permission](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/images/setupconfig.png)

2.) After installation completed. File will be appear on your desktop. It also requires permission to run.

![setup permission](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/images/shortcut.png)

After this command is written, Puse icon on desktop should change.

3.) Right click on shortcut in desktop and choose properties and add java -jar at the beginning of command part.

![setup permission](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/images/shortcutsetting.png)

### Support or Contact
If you have any troubles and questions. You can contact with me via eldemcan@gmail.com . Thanks for your attention. You can visit my personal [web-page](http://about.me/caneldem) also.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
